direction.raw_text: Think I overplayed it?

direction.raw_text: Congress and the Pentagon share a lot of plumbing.  They'll never know whose leak it is. EXT.  BEACH - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - DAY 150-pound rubber boats ("Zodiacs") litter the beach.  The class is breaking down into six-man crews.

direction.raw_text: Boat Five -- Wickwire, Cozad, Vinyl, Intagliata, Ayers, and Wise. Lieutenant Wickwire is your senior officer.  Follow his orders to your death.

direction.raw_text: Ah, c'mon...

direction.raw_text: Motherachrist...

direction.raw_text: No problem, sir!

direction.raw_text: Boat Seven... EXT.  BEACH - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - DAY With BATTLE CRIES, 12 boat crews charge into the teeth of the POUNDING SURF.  Some lose their boat to the first wave; others clear the surf and scramble aboard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into bullhorn) First crew to finish gets hot food and warm racks for the night!  Rest of you are digging hide-sites and eating earthworms tonight! EXT.  OCEAN - DAY Beyond the breakers, the Zodiacs run parallel to shore, crews paddling furiously, racing the wind, the sun, the other crews.  Instructors shadow in power boats, stopwatches running. EXT.  BOAT SIX - OCEAN - DAY McCool Don't wanna be pickin' no sandcrabs outta my ass tonight!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So shutup and stroke, McCool!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hoo-yah!  Hoo-yah! Flea checks on Jordan.  She paddles hard, really digging in.  Flea grins:  On some level, he has to admire this women. Jordan catches the grin, gives one back. Ahead, buoys mark the finish line.  And just when it seems victory is at hand... THWUNK.  Something hits Boat Six.  Suddenly it's losing air.  Jordan torques around to see... The Chief on a nearby boat, speargun in hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your boat just hit razor coral. What do you do now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Patch and pump!  C'mon!  Whose ass is on the kit?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I say keep paddlin'!  We're almost -- ENGLAND Forget it, McCool!  Pri One is to save the boat, not win a race!  So let's get on it! They flail to save their sinking boat.  Boat Five noses past, stealing the lead.  Wickwire tosses Jordan a passing look.  "Sorry, but..." EXT.  UPPER DUNES - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - NIGHT Up and down the dunes, crews are digging "hide-sites" -- six-man holes that will be their homes tonight.  Cortez and Slutnik are uprooting shrubs, collecting camouflage material.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Four years I petition to get into this program.  Four years.  Finally get here, and now it's co-ed?  Such bullshit.  Now I'm gettin' hammered just 'cuz she's on our crew.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Least you don't have to sleep with her every goddamn night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tellin' you, I'd rather be the last class with balls than the first one with chicks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Had a grandaddy who wanted to be a Navy man.  Wanted to fire them big guns on a big-ass battleship.  But Navy said to him, "Oh, no.  You can only do one thing on a battleship." "Well what's that?" grandaddy said. "Cook," they said.  Now this ain't
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT.  UPPER DUNES - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - NIGHT Jordan and Flea fill sand bags to shore up the walls of their hide-site.  England and McCool shovel back to back.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: years ago -- I'm talkin' United States Navy, middla World War II. And you know the reason they gave him?  You know why they tol' my grandaddy he couldn't fight for his country?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He talked too much?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Negroes can't see at night.  Bad night vision."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're kiddin' me. Jordan jumps in the hole, ready to take over shoveling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See, you just the new nigger on the block, O'Neil.  That's all.  And maybe you moved in too early. He climbs out.  HOLD on Jordan, looking off down the dunes, seeing the other crews covering up and going underground for the night.  How the hell did she wind up here?  So far from home? EXT.  SILVER STRAND HIGHWAY - DAY A Jeep speeds along the public highway, carrying the C.O. back to base.  When the Jeep tops a rise: C.O. What in God's name... Ahead, a half-dozen news crews are camped on the shoulder. All cameras are trained on the base. INT.  BEDROOM - GEORGETOWN APARTMENT - NIGHT CAMERA FINDS Navy dress blues laid out on a bed... topcoat draped on a chair-back... CNN on a television.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... is denying that it is considering changing its long-held policy of exclusion -- but it isn't denying the presence of at least one female in a heretofore all-male program.  Dubbed "G.I. Jane" by the media, this woman is now undergoing commando training at the Special Warfare Command Center in San Diego... Half-shaven, Royce leans out of the bathroom in time to catch... Footage from Coronado:  A woman in Navy greens is on a beach run, loaded down with backpack and M-16.  The NEWS FOOTAGE ZOOMS IN, FREEZE FRAMES with the indelible image that will be used over and over in coming weeks:  Woman cradling rifle.  Madonna for the 21st century.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goddamn.  My poster girl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Senator DeHaven's office still has not released the identity of the woman, but DeHaven is confirming that "G.I. Jane" has outlasted many of her male counter-parts in the program, said to be one of the most grueling anywhere.  Joining us now on "Washington Tonight" for the feminist perspective is Gloria Allred, live from -- Royce snaps it off.  He can't take anymore. INT.  BEAU-ART HALL - WASHINGTON D.C. - NIGHT Beneath the coffered ceiling of a great Beau-Art hall, one of Washington's power-tribes is celebrating.  We find gowned women, tuxedoed men, gold-braided naval officers, a SWING BAND, and... Secretary Hayes, newly confirmed.  He beams as he dances with his wife.  Compliments and friendly barbs come from all directions:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Congratulations, Mr. Secretary.  Say hello to the President for me... Maybe now you can change that carpet in your office, Teddy... So what was the deal you made with DeHaven?  Or was it the Devil?  Always get them confused...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Didn't you hear?  Effective immediately, all navy vessels can no longer be referred to as "she." BRAYS of laughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... women are child-bearers.  Life- givers.  Now we're going to make them killers?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... just don't have the upper-body strength...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How strong do you need to be to launch a rocket?  To push a button or pull a trigger? Royce can't get away from it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are we going to dance?
direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Commander Royce.  How's life across the river?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Little slow, sir.  When's the Pentagon going to send me a good crisis?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll check my out-basket in the morning.  Say, do you know... The E-Ringer turns to make introductions -- but finds his CIRCLE OF FRIENDS embroiled in the topic du jour:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... but men have trained as athletes for 5,000 years.  Women have been at it for, what, couple of decades?  Do we really know the limits of their strength?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or their endurance?  You know, 30 years ago, women marathoners were 90 minutes off the pace of the men. Now, the women's time is probably only 20 minutes off.

direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : INT.  BEAU-ART HALL - WASHINGTON D.C. - NIGHT Royce, EXCUSING his way through the crowd, fixating on the bar, leading his DIAL-A-DATE winner by the hand. Conversations drift into earshot:
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: .I. Jane" there instead of a man? Eyes drift to Royce, inviting him into the fray.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to dial-a-date) You wait right here.  I'll get the drinks. INT.  MEZZANINE - BEAU-ART HALL - NIGHT Heading upstairs with an iceless rum.  Royce finds a calm and secluded place to get drunk in peace and quiet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take my word for it.  It's just not going to happen.  Not now, not anytime soon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're guaranteeing that? Royce frowns:  He thought he was alone.  He tracks the voices to a forced-air vent beside the chaise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have it on unorthodox but reliable authority that combat positions will remain off-limits.  Despite what's happening with our Babe in Boyland. Alarms go off in Royce's head.  He moves quickly to a railing, looks down. ROYCE'S POV:  Of two naval officers on the floor below. They stand beside a matching vent.  It's impossible to see faces from this angle -- but one man has a distinct bald spot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, isn't that what these test cases are supposed to decide? (thinking) Unless, of course, you're suggesting that "G.I. Jane" is on her way to becoming "Jane Doe"...

direction.raw_text: All I'm saying is that we won't be integrating -- despite the rhetoric coming off Capitol Hill, despite what's happening in Coronado.  And you did not hear it from me.

direction.raw_text: Hear what? A conspiratorial handshake.  The men split up. INT.  BEAU-ART HALL - WASHINGTON D.C. - NIGHT Royce flashes down the stairs.  Hitting main floor, he looks around and then bumps into...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There you are.  Can we please dance now? Over her shoulder, Royce spies Bald Spot heading for the cloak room.  Royce commandeers the nearest J.O.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take a dance! INT.  BEAU-ART HALL - WASHINGTON D.C. - NIGHT Royce bobs and weaves through the crowd, trying to keep sight of... Bald Spot.  Pushing through the exit doors. Only steps behind, Royce shoulders through the doors... EXT.  BEAU-ART HALL - WASHINGTON D.C. - NIGHT And blasts outside, intending to shake some answers out of Bald Spot.  But here Royce finds... A dozen naval officers waiting for their cars.  All of them now wear caps. Royce tries to check faces of the quickly departing men. but it could have been anyone.

direction.raw_text: Crew Six!  Stand by!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flea!  'Cool!  O'Neil!  Cortez! Slutnik!  In that order!  Five- second intervals!  Let's go! England's crew lines up for cast-and-recover drills:  One by one, they speed-roll off the transport... ... and drop into the life boat.  After quickly stabilizing, they roll off the life boat... ... and disappear underwater like human bullets.  England is last to cast off. EXT.  OCEAN - DAY Jordan resurfaces.  Treading water, she scans for... Seafox.  It makes a hard turn in the water and starts back.  The recovery rig -- a big flexible loop -- is lowered into position. Still hauling ass, Seafox picks up the trainees in reverse order -- England, Slutnik, Cortez.  They each stab an arm through the passing loop... EXT.  SEAFOX - OCEAN - DAY ... and vault back aboard, slick as hell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hoo-yah!  Better'n sex in a car crash! But now they're bearing down fast on... EXT.  OCEAN - DAY Jordan.  She braces as best she can.  As SEAFOX THUNDERS past, she stabs for the loop... And snags it with her hand.  But only her hand. Hanging on grimly, Jordan drags face down in torrential water.  Her mouth gropes for clean air but can't find it. If she doesn't let go soon, she'll drown. EXT.  SEAFOX - OCEAN - DAY At the stern, the Chief spots Jordan bobbing up in the boat's wake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to pilot) Next recovery!  Keep goin', keep goin'! EXT.  OCEAN - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - DAY COUGHING up water, Jordan watches Seafox speed on toward McCool and Flea.  They make textbook recoveries.  She's the only one who couldn't cut it. INT.  WOMEN'S SHOWERS - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - NIGHT Head hung, Jordan showers alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, the Israelis... Jordan recoils.  Christ, how long has he been there?  Just standing in the doorway?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... they tried women in the 1967 War.  Female soldiers. With forced calm, Jordan squeaks off the water and finds a towel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Permission to get dressed, sir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It seems the men couldn't get used to the sight of women blown open and their viscera hanging from tree limbs.  Israeli men would linger over wounded females -- often to the detriment of the mission, often endangering their own lives.  They don't use women anymore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (moving closer) Sir, someone mentioned you received the Navy Cross.  May I ask what you got it for?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For pulling a 210-pound man out of a burning barrack in Saudi Arabia.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see.  So when a man tries to rescue another man, he's a hero. But when he tries to rescue a woman, he's gone soft.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could you have pulled that 210-pound man clear, lieutenant? She can't say yes.  She wants to but can't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Females in combat situations impact unit cohesion.  Men fight better without women around.  And that is an historical fact.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It also seems like a problem with the men's attitude, sir.  So maybe you should be sniffing around their shower room instead. She shoulders past.  The Chief gives her a few steps before dropping his bomb:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: England went out with a stress fracture.  That puts you in charge, lieutenant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off-balance) McCool's that same rank.  We're both j.g.'s.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were commissioned one month earlier, which makes you the senior officer. (passing her on his way out) Remember.  There are no bad crews -- only bad leaders. INT.  ARTILLERY RANGE - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - DAY Trainees are getting familiar with M-60 machine guns, firing SHORT BURST at downfield targets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pissed) No operational experience, and now she's callin' the shots? Unbelievable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suppose she'll wanna eat with us now... Jordan overhears them BITCHING.  She steps up to an open slot -- and proceeds to WAIL AWAY with her M-60, tracer rounds blazing.  Her target vaporized, she keeps WAILING madly, taking out Slutnik's target... then Cortez's... then...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: O'Neil... O'Neil... O'NEIL! Finally she stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One burst, one body, O'Neil!  What the fuck you trying to do?  Spell your name? (to class) You are not infantry!  Your firepower is limited!  Excessive killing only risks compromise... Reloading, Jordan tosses a look at Slutnik and Cortez. Ain't nobody bitchin' now. EXT.  MESS HALL - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - NIGHT BLONDELL (O.S.) S.E.R.E. training coming up. Eating at a table with other women, Jordan turns to see Blondell setting down her tray.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They take you away to San Clemente Island.  Half the guys quit when they come back.  Supposed to be just hell-and-a-half.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what I hear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I ask you somethin', lieutenant? How come you're doing this?  I mean, we're kinda curious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's "we"?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just some of the women. EXT.  QUARTERDECK - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - NIGHT Walking across the base:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know if there's any single reason.  But my father was Navy. And he had this old-time recruiting poster in his den.  It showed a girl trying on a sailor's uniform while saying, "Gee, I wish I were a man! I'd join the Navy!"  Was maybe 10 years old when I first saw it, and even then it felt wrong.  Made me mad.  And I don't think a month has gone by that I haven't thought about that poster.  "Gee, I wish I were a man."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've been accused of that wish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The woman I saw you with...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just a friend.  We have friends, too, you know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But are there... I mean, how many...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More than you'd guess.  It's just that we don't hold coffee klatches. If more then three of us get together at any one time, the guys think it's some kind of uprising. They laugh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sounds funny now, but it's really not.  We have to be careful.  The Navy still knows how to put on a witch-hunt. Reaching the quarterdeck, they scan a message board. Jordan finds a half-dozen phone slips for her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Royce... INT.  GEORGETOWN APARTMENT - NIGHT ROYCE (into phone) I've been trying you for five days. Don't they give you messages?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's hard to find time to sleep, Royce.  Much less keep up with my phone life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How hard they making it on you? EXT.  PHONE KIOSK - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - NIGHT Jordan sighs and slumps against the phone kiosk.  Where to start?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That bad?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I feel like there's men here, there's women here -- then there's men.  But hey, what'd I expect? INTERCUTTING Jordan and Royce:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, not this.  I was doing the Pentagon scene few nights ago.  Got some fresh stuff -- about you.  You may be in a hostile camp.  I think someone may be taking steps to ensure that you crash and burn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me?  Why me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you know?  How they're talking about you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I saw an article...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't walk two blocks in Washington without hearing about
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT.  OCEAN - DAY A high-speed transport ("Seafox") is SLAMMING OVER SWELLS. Lashed to one side is a rubber life boat. EXT.  SEAFOX - OCEAN - DAY THE CHIEF
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: .I. Jane."  You're all over the place, and whether you wanted it or not, the feminists are sizing you up for that poster. Jordan's face sours with an errant thought.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So why are you telling me this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Big symbols make big targets, Jordan.  I think someone's gunning for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, Royce, I got enough heat on me without you turning up the jets, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm only trying to warn you in case -- JORDAN Well, let me warm you:  I'm going though with this.  The more everybody fucks with me, fucks with my head, the more it just makes me want to finish.  So don't expect me back crying in your arms any time soon, okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's not what I want, Jordan.  I mean... it is and it isn't...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still can't make up your mind, huh? Gotta go, Royce.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jordan.  You watch your ass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure.  I'll join the crowd. EXT.  AIR STATION - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - NIGHT A HELO WARMS UP on its pad. Crew Six approaches, garbed in black wetsuits, loaded down with weapons and rucksacks.  Jordan is at the lead. INT.  HELO - NIGHT The helo is airborne.  Sitting on rucksacks, trainees slather their faces with green camouflage paint.  Over the HOWLING ROTORS:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Infiltrate... establish your hide- site... record any movement of troops, vehicles, patrols -- any activity inside your scan.  If you are compromised, you have two options!  Newberry! Newberry is the new sixth man.  He's young enough to still have a hyperactive Adam's apple.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Evasive maneuvers or radio for emergency extraction, sir!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you are extracting, be damn sure to follow procedures you have learned in your classroom training! A helo cannot extract you from a wooded area!  You must bring it down in a clearing!  What's the minimum clearance for an MH-60 Black Hawk, McCool?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: feet, six inches, sir!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You will be penalized for early extraction, but you will be penalized more for capture -- trust me, far more!  Survival!  Evasion! Rescue!  Evacuation!  Welcome to S.E.R.E.! EXT.  OCEAN - NIGHT The helo swoops low over the water, moon silhouetting. Black figures helo-cast into the ocean. INT.  HELO - NIGHT Last out, Jordan is poised to follow when...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lieutenant!  Don't back down! Jordan looks back.  "What the hell does that mean?" Offering no elaboration, Pyro signals "GO!"  Jordan springs clear... EXT.  OCEAN - NIGHT ... and knifes into black water. The HELO PATTERS away. An inky stillness overtakes the world. Jordan activates a red-light beacon, sweeps it around, revealing her position to... Her crew.  Five black faces regroup around her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Feel right at home, McCool? They secure weapons atop their waterproof rucksacks. Jordan checks a heat-bearing compass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (nodding direction) South-southeast.  And I don't want to hear another word till we're underground. Pushing rucksacks ahead of them, they start swimming towards... A moonlit shoreline.  Half-mile ahead. EXT.  ROCKY SHORELINE - SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - NIGHT Jordan's crew reaches shallow water.  They deflate their vests and rucksacks.  Jordan trades her face mask for night-vision goggles. NIGHT-VISION POV:  Sweeping the rocks.  Nothing at first. Then two "hostiles" appear, patrolling the rocks. Jordan motions "down."  Six faces sink from sight. NIGHT-VISION/UNDERWATER POV:  Of the "hostile" patrol moving on. They resurface.  On Jordan's cue, the crew sheds flippers and begins scaling rocks.  They've made landfall. EXT.  HIDE-SITE MONTAGE - SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - NIGHT MONTAGE:  Racing the coming sun, Jordan's crew builds their hide-site... digging feverishly... filling sand bags... telescoping open a roof pole, fanning out spars... laying canvas roof panels into place... camouflaging the panels... sprinkling sanitizing powder around the perimeter to ward off animals.  INTERCUT WITH... A snake slithering across the ground.  As it nears the hide-site... A knife whacks its head off. Slutnik picks up the carcass, kicks dirt over the severed head.  No trace. EXT.  SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - DAY CAMERA PANS the island, awash in morning light.  Woodlands lie distant.  A road is the only man-made feature -- until in FOREGROUND, we find a spotting scope poking from the ground. INT.  HIDE-SITE - SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - DAY SCOPE POV:  Of the road.  Fast-attack vehicles approach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (peering into scope) Got two FAVs moving south.  I make... four banditos aboard, carrying... H-60 machine guns... Jordan REPEATS THE INFO into a digital tape-recorder, adds the time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Newberry, get a photo.  South?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Entering my scan now...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: West?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Clear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: North?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Clear. SCOPE POV:  Of the FAVs disappearing down the road.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: FAVs clear. Everyone relaxes -- as much as six people can in a hole five feet-wide.  McCool opens up MREs (Meals Ready to Eat) Slutnik guts his snake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mind?  I'm trying to eat here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So am I. Cortez finishes pissing into a tin pot.  He transfers the waste to a zip-lock baggy, offers the pot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anyone? He looks at Jordan.  She eyes the pot, tempted and nettled at the same time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't wanna evacuate 'cuz someone came down with uric poisoning, el- tee. Abruptly Jordan unzips, drops her pants, sticks the pot under her.  It raises eyebrows:  It's a far cry from when she was covering up in cold water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Didn't even bitch about the seat, did I? EXT.  SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - DAY WIDE VIEW:  As a lone figure appears on foot. INT.  HIDE-SITE - SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - DAY MCCOOL What the... Got an unknown here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: yards north-northeast. They pile up at McCool's scope.  Jordan bulls her way through. SCOPE POV:  It's a women.  Dressed in civilian clothes, she collects firewood.  And she's coming this way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She part of the training?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "She?"  There's another one? McCool takes a second look. SCOPE POV:  Of the women drawing closer... closer... and finally looking dead-bang at us.  She does an about-face and walks away.  Quickly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit.  Think we're had.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smoke her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I ain't gonna shoot her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only blanks.  Lemme do it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pushing him away) Hey.  Ain't your call, man. He looks to Jordan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pri One is to protect the mission. If she represents a real threat, we have to do it. Pleased, Cortez slips his rifle under a roof panel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to McCool) But did she see us?  Do you know for a fact that we are compromised? McCool doesn't.  Not for sure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If not, firing will only give away our position to hostiles in the area.  Now how smart is that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (a beat) Mighta been civilian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They got regular peeps on this island, don't they? EXT.  ROAD - SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - DAY The asphalt road shimmers with midday heat.  Suddenly a TROOP CARRIER ROARS over a rise. INT.  HIDE-SITE - SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - DAY SCOPE POV:  Of the troop carrier braking hard.  "Hostiles" spill out the rear -- and fan out all around us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (at scope) Banditos on the east perimeter!  150 yards!  Shit, she was part of it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the word, el-tee?  We're about one minute from a major take- down here. HOLD on Jordan, heart skipping.  Did she really make the wrong call?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, fire-and-evade maneuvers. Drop everything but weapons and the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: radio -- we're gonna be high speed, low drag all the way to the link-up site.  Ready?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure.  Now she wants to shoot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! EXT.  SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - DAY They come out of the hide-site like atomic locusts, splintering into three groups and laying down SUPPRESSIVE FIRE as they blitz for... The woodlands. "Hostiles" FIRE and pursue. Flea is running flat out when the ground vanishes beneath him.  He goes down like a doped race horse.  Suddenly exposed, another crew scrambles into daylight:  Flea ran right over their hide-site. Slutnik yanks Flea out, gets him back on his feet. EXT.  WOODS - SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - DAY Breathing like asthmatics, Jordan's crew regroups at the link-up site just inside the woods.  Flea comes in hobbling.  Badly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This ain't workin' right!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's our go-to-shit plan, O'Neil?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This ain't even workin' wrong! A beat as Jordan deliberates.  She doesn't want to go out like this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really don't wanna be captured, el- tee.  Heard some bad things.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck. (snatching the radio) Basher-Basher, this is Ground Crew Six requesting emergency extraction. Stand by for a PRC fix... EXT.  SKY - DAY As a helo pirouettes in midair. EXT.  WOODS - SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - DAY Jordan's crew lopes through the woods, searching for a place to bring the helo down.  Right on their heels... ARTILLERY SIMULATORS THUMP-THUMP-THUMP, illumination GRENADES POP and flare.  This may not be war, but it'll do until the real thing comes along. INT.  HELO - DAY PILOT'S POV:  Buzzing treetops, searching. EXT.  WOODS - SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - DAY On the run:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: feet, six inches!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm lookin', I'm lookin'! Finally they break into a clearing.  Is it big enough?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'Cool?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (doesn't care) Smoke it! Jordan chucks a smoke grenade. INT.  HELO - DAY PILOT'S POV:  Yellow smoke rises from the woods.  We swoop toward it. EXT.  CLEARING IN WOODS - SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - DAY Whirling smoke, the helo descends.  Jordan's crew breaks early, trying to get there the instant it touches down. But before they can... An FAV crashes through the underbrush, M-60s BARKING in the helo's direction.  The helo bounds away. Jordan's crew tries to retreat -- but a second FAV cuts them off. INT.  HELO - DAY PILOT'S POV:  Of the action below, growing smaller and smaller:  Jordan's crew.  Surrounded.  Laying down weapons.  Captured. EXT.  WOODS - SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - DAY JORDAN'S POV:  Brush slapping her face. Crew Six is being hauled through the woods, hands tied back, boots around their necks, pulled along by... The captors.  We assume they're instructors in camouflage paint -- but we're moving so fast it's impossible to be sure. EXT.  P.O.W. CAMP - SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - DAY A P.O.W. camp, disturbingly authentic.  A dozen trainees are already here, held in pens of bamboo and barbed-wire. Flea, McCool, Slutnik, Cortez, Newberry -- all five get tossed into a pen.  Jordan is pulled away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you... HEY!  Where are you taking her? EXT.  BOXES - P.O.W. CAMP - SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - DAY Jordan is thrown to the ground.  Her eyes go wide when she sees a row of steel boxes nearby.  They're scarcely larger then coffins. INT.  BOX - P.O.W. CAMP - DAY Hands push Jordan inside the box.  She has to curl up fetally just to fit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long? (no answer) Please, HOW LONG? The LID BANGS closed.  A LOCK RATCHETS, FOOTSTEPS RETREAT. Daylight sheets in through ventilation slats. When her eyes adjust, Jordan finds markings on the lid and walls.  Scratchings made with a nail.  The memoirs of previous tenants.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Don't know how much I can take"...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: little taste of death"... "Save the nail"... (then the real kick- in-the-teeth) "It's been three days now"... EXT.  P.O.W. CAMP - SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - NIGHT As "hostiles" pull Flea out of the pen. INT.  BOX - P.O.W. CAMP - NIGHT A BANGING wakes Jordan.  Are they coming for her?  But FOOTSTEPS LEAVE.  A GROAN from the adjacent box.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (a beat) You know, I had an apartment about this size once.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wick.  They got your crew, too?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Intagliata was out chasing breakfast.  They found his tracks. Well, shit. A beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You really came back for more?  Of this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When I was sittin' behind a desk in Washington, it made sense, somehow. Blame it on my big brother.  He was Spec-Recon.  And the stories he used to tell...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you got a good one, Wick... Anything to get her mind off this box.  Out of this box. Now INTERCUT Jordan and Wickwire, lying like fraternal twins in their wombs of steel:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One time he was doing a rekkie of the Libyan coastline.  This is, like, right before we bombed Khadaffi into the past tense.  So his crew does a nighttime infil, maps all the big artillery placements and stuff, then turns around to get the hell gone.  But between them and the water are five Libyan guards, all armed to the nuts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They had to kill 'em?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nah, they were dead-ass asleep.  But on every guard's chest,they left one Marlboro cigarette.  Just a little calling card to say they'd been there -- and could come back any time they wanted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's a good story.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So the shit you gotta go through? To get from here to there?  Brother said it was worth it.  Worth the training... worth the divorce... worth anything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was married?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At first.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got anybody, Wick?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not me.  You? It hurts to think about it.  The Potomac.  The gunkhole harbor.  Royce.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: O'Neil?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How'd you make it last time, Wick? How'd you get through this part?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (a beat) Last time I didn't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (jarred) Let's keep talkin', Wick.  Just keep talkin' to me... EXT.  NEWSSTAND - WASHINGTON D.C. - DAY Royce stops for a newspaper.  As he pays, something else catches his eye.  He picks up... A "People" magazine.  The grainy image of "G.I. Jane" fills the cover.  A photo inset, much clearer, shows a beaming DeHaven.  "BEHIND EVERY GREAT WOMAN..."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shaking head) Suitable for framing... INT.  CORRIDOR - N.I.C. - DAY ROYCE Got time for a brain-pick? Reading as he walks, a former CIA spook looks up to find Royce in lockstep.  It surprises him:  Not many people here talk to him -- unless they're in trouble.  THE SPOOK is physically unremarkable except for a face that would be right at home on Easter Island:  This is a man who's seen most of the world's ills -- and forgotten none.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Subject?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: O'Neil, Jordan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thought you two were file-closed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You knew about us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry.  Thought you knew I knew. INT.  SITUATION ROOM - N.I.C. - DAY Royce and the Spook enter.  The vault-like door closes emphatically.  Ensuring their privacy:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Computer -- no transcription, no com-link, no data-link.  In fact... shut-down sequence 0-Niner-0-8, mark. All around, screens go blank, phone lights extinguish. They sit at the conference table.  No Computer.  No files. Just two guys doing headwork.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right.  So who stands to gain if Jordan flames out in a big way?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The E-Ringers?  Full integration is gonna cost the services billions at the worst possible time -- when Congress is already swinging the axe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (agreeing) Congress cuts, military bleeds.  But Pentagon's a big place.  Let's narrow the sights.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Navy?  They've made it clear they don't want to pull missiles out of subs to make room for women's heads.  What's it gonna cost to make a fleet of Trident's co-ed? THE SPOOK Sabotage born of economics? Wouldn't be a first.  But is Hayes really going to start his watch with such a public failure?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Possibly.  Just to spite DeHaven.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hmm.  Let's aim higher. Royce blinks.  "What's higher?"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The White House.  If Jordan wins, DeHaven wins in spades.  Why?  Well, it's been said that the only man the President fears -- ain't no man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The first female President?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't for a second think she didn't leak this story.  "G.I. Jane" gives DeHaven a symbol that taps into the biggest constituency of them all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Women.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you were the President, wouldn't that put a little piss in your shoes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know.  Seems...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This ain't about some little soldier girl sloggin' her way through commando school.  The implications go way beyond.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Christ, I don't want to see her take a fall.  She thinks I do, but...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I take it this file is still open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shaping his words) Even tough I don't talk to her every day -- I still talk to her every day.  Know what I mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (nodding) Okay, so now work it from the other end.  Think about California -- and how things might be handled there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't... (scoffing) What, someone on base?  A "mole"?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is what you get for brain- picking an old CIA spook.  but if I needed to control the outcome of this test case, that's how I'd do it.  A man-in-place.  Makes everything very controllable. INT.  BOX - P.O.W. CAMP - DAY JORDAN'S POV:  The box opening.  Daylight assaulting us, blowing out our eyes.  Disembodied hands pulling us out. EXT.  P.O.W. CAMP - SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - DAY Legs hobbled, uniform soiled, Jordan is led past a row of huts.  She looks like she got hit by a train -- and got back up. JORDAN'S POV:  Vision still blown out.  But inside the pen, we make out 40 trainees now.  One guy wrings out a sock and drinks from it. Jordan moves past huts.  VOLATILE VOICES spill out as trainees get interrogated. JORDAN'S POV:  Outside one hut, we see Flea.  At least we think it's him:  Strapped face-down to a table, sobbing quietly, he wears a slinky dress and whore's makeup.  They broke him -- and it's an ugly, ugly sight. INT.  INTERROGATION HUT - P.O.W. CAMP - DAY THE CHIEF What is your father's name? Jordan seated.  Prowling the hut is her interrogator.  Her tormentor.  Her chaperon through Hell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Simple question, lieutenant.  No reason not to answer.  What is your father's name?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Dad."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any brothers?  Sisters?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dick, Jane, and Spot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you hungry?  What's your favorite food?  We'll try to get it for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Green Eggs and Ham.  You're not going to get anywhere.  You might as well put me in the cage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are in the cage, O'Neil.  Right here, right now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Should I be afraid?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right down to your worthless womb, and I'll tell you why.  This is my island.  My world.  And here I can get away with shit that would get me arrested anywhere else in the world. Take another scan of my little joy- boy outside.  If I can do that to a Navy Seal, what's gonna happen to you?  Huh? It makes Jordan think -- and yes, it makes her afraid. Continuing the psychological strip-search:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why didn't you shoot the woman, O'Neil?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wasn't deemed a threat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She led us right to you.  That's no threat? Jordan rubs her head.  So long ago.  How did the call come down?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would you have shot if it was a man?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.  Yes.  I mean, depends on -- THE CHIEF The others already told me, O'Neil. They wanted to shoot, but you wouldn't let them.  Because you went soft on another women -- JORDAN That's not right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what your crew said.  Are they lying?  Or are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you're the liar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not the one who got five good men thrown in a bamboo cage.  You wear the bars, you made the call, and you got your whole crew -- JORDAN We didn't know we were compromised. Firing would only've given away our position.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think we should go easy on women, O'Neil? She stares a beat, knowing it's a loaded question.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm so glad we agree. With stunning ferocity, he grabs her by the neck, pushes her out the door... EXT.  P.O.W. CAMP - SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - DAY ... and throws her onto a table. In the pens, all faces turn to watch.  Even instructors stop what they're doing as... The Chief pushes Jordan's head down and jams up behind her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Didn't you know you'd be raped if you were captured?  Didn't you even think about that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure.  Just like your men do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think we oughtta practice it, just so you know what to expect. He flips her over, rips off her belt, starts tearing open her pants.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Should I practice bleeding, too, sir?  Would that make me a better soldier? He covers her mouth -- her whole face -- with one hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the men) Any of you can stop this!  Just give me the location of one more hide- site, and it ends right here! In the pen:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (wide-eyed) Someone's trippin' out here... The Chief jerks Jordan up, whirls her around like a dead dance partner, slams her face-first into the pen to give the guys a good look at what's happening to that pretty face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three crews are still on this island somewhere.  Who knows where? The men trade itchy looks.  Some do know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't do it, don't do it... The Chief throws her down like garbage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's gonna tell me?  Who's gonna be chivalrous and stop this abuse? What, you want to see her get mauled?  Is that it? The men shift anxiously.  Should they talk?  Behind the Chief, Jordan staggers to her feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't tell him shi -- The Chief whirls, decks her a crescent-kick.  Instructors lurch forward instinctively.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (waving them back) She's fine! (squatting beside) When I put you down, O'Neil, take the hint and stay down. She licks her bloody teeth -- and considers kicking his balls into his brainpan.  Instead she makes a move to get up.  He grinds her back down with a crowbar forearm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (for her ears only) I am saving your life, O'Neil.  You may not know it, but I do.  You're an inferior soldier, a bad officer, and I don't want you learning that inconvenient truth when you're stuck in a muddy bomb crater behind enemy lines and don't know how the fuck to get out.  You get out now, O'Neil. Seek life elsewhere.  And if you can't do it in front of me, do it behind my back. Pinning her down with just his eyes, he rises -- and starts away. Behind him, Jordan struggles to rise. An ANXIOUS MURMUR races through the men:  They don't want to see this.  They don't want to see her crucified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Down... stay down... Hearing, the Chief turns back to see... Jordan wobbling to her feet. Eye-lock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck you and the boat you rode in on.  Sir. TIGHT on the faces of her crewmates -- Slutnik, Cortez, McCool.  In their eyes, a new respect.  The Chief see it. Instructors see it.  Everyone does.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to instructors) We're done here. Beaten, he walks right out of camp. Wordless, instructors open the pens, unlock the boxes. Wickwire rises like a vampire in daylight.  But this time he made it. A medic tries to help Jordan, but she pushes him away, walking drunkenly for... Flea.  She begins wiping the makeup from his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Make you a deal, Flea.  Never tell me how I look -- and I'll never tell you. EXT.  PIERS - SAN CLEMENTE ISLAND - SUNSET The Chief chucks gear onto a transport boat.  FOOTSTEPS approach.  He knows it's Pyro.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't think she'd be raped if she were captured?  You don't think the threat of rape would be used to leverage the men?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You broke a dozen training rules back there -- before I lost count.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've had it.  Just because they pay me like a baby-sitter doesn't mean I'm gonna be one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's a trainee, just like the others.  Why are you coming down so hard?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's an officer.  There's a higher standard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's a women, and that's why you're ridin' her bareback.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course it is.  And I'm gonna stay on her until everyone realizes this is not some bullshit equal-rights thing, that real lives are gonna be lost.  Maybe mine, maybe yours.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I oughtta report you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you probably would -- if you didn't know I was right. EXT.  STREET - WASHINGTON D.C. - DAY As a limo moves -- heads for the Capitol building. INT.  DEHAVEN'S LIMO - DAY DeHaven snags a BUZZING PHONE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (anxious) Did you hear?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She made it through S.E.R.E. training.  Got a call this morning from -- DEHAVEN'S AIDE (V.O.) Not that.  The White House just announced that it was sponsoring legislation that would, in one stroke, void all remaining elements of the 1948 Combat Exclusion Laws. The phone suddenly weights a ton, DeHaven dumps it on the seat beside her.  HOLD on her disbelieving face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You there?  Senator? INT.  CORRIDOR - PENTAGON - DAY Hand-carrying a report, Flag Officer #1 hurries down a corridor, pushes through a door.  HOLD on the door marker: "Secretary of the Navy." INT.  SECNAV OFFICE - PENTAGON - DAY HAYES Without telling us they do this? With absolutely no lead time? At his desk, Hayes scans the report with a deepening frown.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Hayes) Mr. Secretary, if this bill passes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forget our three-year plan.  They're rushing the cadence.  We'll be forced to reorganize the Navy from top to bottom -- overnight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell is the President trying to do?  Steal DeHaven's thunder?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think it's more important, sir, to decide what we're going to do -- since it's apparent this issue is not going away quietly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .I. Jane."  And which one of you told me she wouldn't last a week? Huh? The flags squirm.  Shaking his head, Hayes moves to a window that offers a stunning view of Arlington National Cemetery.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: years in the Pentagon, I finally rate an office with a window -- and it looks out over the world's largest graveyard.  Think it's a sign? EXT.  GRINDER - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - NIGHT The bell.  It reflects the moon.  TILT DOWN to reveal a new batch of helmets -- the casualties of S.E.R.E.  A graveyard of its own. EXT.  THE EXCHANGE - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - NIGHT Jordan exits with purchases.  Her face is still bruised from S.E.R.E.  With a minute to kill, she peruses a bulletin board casually.  But a RAISED VOICE leads her eyes to... Wickwire.  At a phone kiosk, he hangs up emphatically.  He looks flustered when he spots Jordan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, didn't mean to -- WICKWIRE That's okay.  Just an ex-girlfriend. And know I remember why.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First big night of liberty and no date?  You're pathetic, Wickwire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe I'll just head over to McP's with the others, have a drink or four.  Don't wanna come, do you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (touching bruises) I can't go out.  Not like this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you look beautiful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks for lying.  But you're the class officer, Wick, and it'd just be weird if we hook up.  Besides... Catching up, Blondell exits the exchange.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry.  Forgot I needed oregano and... She sees Wickwire.  An awkward beat for them all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you, uh, know...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure, sure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're going over to her place to make salad and pasta.  Just, you know, nothing special.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay.  Well... thought I'd ask. Jordan and Blondell head for the parking lot.  HOLD on Wickwire, looking after them.  Thinking it through. INT.  CLASSROOM - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - DAY Charts are being passed around the room.  Every trainee takes one, including Jordan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... underwater detonation devices employ mechanical timers, and as such, they are subject to variances due to water temperature.  That's why when clearing mines, we always use two timers.  The charts now being passed out contain calculations you must memorize before... A MILITARY COP fills the classroom doorway.  Frowning, Johns joins the cop for a private discussion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: O'Neil?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're wanted at the C.O.'s. INT.  C.O.'S OUTER OFFICE - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - DAY Jordan enters.  The yeoman's desk is unattended.  Noticing the X.O.'s door open, Jordan peers inside to find... Blondell.  She looks scared out of her mind.  Before she and Jordan can speak, the yeoman materializes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This way, lieutenant.  They're expecting you. INT.  C.O.'S OFFICE - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - DAY JORDAN See me, sir? The C.O. and X.O. are both here. C.O. (uncomfortable) I don't know of any delicate way to say this, lieutenant, so I won't try.  Claims have been made that you have engaged in fraternization -- of the same-sex variety.  Specifically, that you were... (reading)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... seen leaving the apartment of another female officer at such a time and in such a manner as to suggest conduct unbecoming."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (a beat,laughing in relief) Sir, if someone is suggesting that I'm a lesbian, they're wrong. The C.O.'s face remains grim.  He isn't relieved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're very wrong.  And I'd like to know where you got this information. On the C.O.'s nod, the X.O. opens an adjoining office. Wickwire enters.  He's stiff as a groom on a wedding cake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, O'Neil.  But as class officer, it's my obligation to report all violations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is insane.  You've got no proof. X.O. (from report) You were seen leaving Ensign Blondell's apartment at approximately 0-200, whereupon physical affections were exchanged in public.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We hugged. X.O. In addition, you have been seen frequenting the base exchange, the mess hall, the -- JORDAN Because the men didn't want me eating with them.  Jesus Christ, let's get this right. C.O. That's enough.  Everybody. (to Wickwire) Rejoin your class, lieutenant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (only to Jordan) I wish I didn't have to do this, Jordan. C.O. Dismissed, lieutenant. Wickwire exits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, I just want you to know that this is either a gross mistake -- or someone's vindictive bullshit. In no way did anything happen between Ensign Blondell and myself. We're just friends. X.O. So you're saying the charges have no validity whatsoever? Jordan opens her mouth to confirm -- and hesitates, realizing where this might be headed.  What the collateral damage might be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm saying, we're just friends. C.O. I find this as distasteful as you, lieutenant.  But if it's on my desk, it's on my shoulders.  There's going to be an inquiry -- it will not be quick and it will definitely not be pretty.  You should prepare yourself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, please... if there's any way to do this without dragging everyone through the mud... C.O. I don't see how, O'Neil.  Dismissed. Jordan moves to the door.  Again she makes eye-contact with Blondell.  Now we understand why she's so scared: There's a witch-hunt brewing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (turning back) Sir.  If tomorrow... I was not under your command... would the inquiry still go forward? C.O. I'm not sure what -- JORDAN Would you have the discretion to end it right then and there? She's offering her own head on a silver platter -- and the C.O. actually hesitates before answering. C.O. I believe so. EXT.  GRINDER - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - DAY McCool and Flea exit a classroom with other trainees. They spot Jordan approaching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what'd he want?  O'Neil? She passes them robotically.  Flea realizes where she's going.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, no... no, no, no, no... They lurch after her, grabbing her, stepping in her way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stand fast! McCool and Flea jerk to a stop:  The Chief has emerged from the instructor's office.  Helpless, they watch as... Jordan mounts the stairs to the bell... takes up the baton... and HITS THE BELL like a tyko drummer. RING ONE:  On the pained faces of her crewmates. RING TWO:  On the Chief.  Taking no joy in it.  Just accepting it as inevitable. EXT.  THE QUARTERDECK - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - DAY RING THREE:  On Wickwire as he walks across the base.  His regrets are obvious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in her ear) I want to kill them... I want to kill the guys who made you cry like this... INT.  COVERED PORCH - JORDAN'S HOUSE - SUNSET An hour later.  Sharing a quiet moment, Jordan and Royce cradle tea mugs while sitting on the rear porch that overlooks the Potomac and a fiery sunset.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All I wanted was an honest chance. And If I couldn't get it, I couldn't stay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And this class officer... "Wickwire."  You think he was just trying to get even?  Striking back for...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe.  Though it didn't seem like he was getting any satisfaction out of it.  Almost like... (a beat) Did I say he was class officer?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Almost like someone put him up to it.  Okay, who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No shortage of suspects.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Chief?  Or maybe even Turrentine?  Your C.O.? She looks at him sidelong.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Royce.  Tell me you didn't keep a file on me. INT.  LIVING ROOM - JORDAN'S HOUSE - DAY CLOSE on multiple files being pulled out of a briefcase. One contains clippings -- "G.I. Jane" photos, editorials, political cartoons.  Another holds records of Coronado personnel -- Jordan's crewmates, instructors, the base brass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Somebody was yankin' your stings, Jordan -- maybe from 3,000 miles away.  I wanted to know who.  I still do. She shakes her head, resisting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, Jordan.  Do the headwork with me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's done with, Royce.  Let it go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone screwed you over like this, left unanswered charges hanging over your head, and you're not gonna fight back?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm tired of fighting back.  I just wanted to come home and be safe and have you here and the river there and just forget the rest of the world, okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, before you crawl off to die, Jordan, give me five minutes of good headwork. Agitated, she walks away.  B.G., a PHONE RINGS until the machine picks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pulling a file) "John James Urgayle."  The Chief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Instructors typically pull three year assignments.  This guy's in and out in one year -- your year.  That sound right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sounds like an amazing coincidence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or like maybe he was baby sitting a problem child for the Navy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know, I don't care.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, pardon me if I do.  Now who else?  Who could've leveraged a class officer like that?  C'mon, Jordan, keep your head in the game. UNDER DIALOG, we hear some of the INCOMING CALL:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... just got word today.  The Senator wants you to know that she's disturbed by the matter, and she'll be looking into it carefully to make sure you were treated fairly.  If you need to reach us, we're here in Washington, 202-224-3121. A HANG-UP.  Something stirs in Jordan's memory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "In Washington..."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wickwire said he was dry-docked in Washington between stints at Coronado... We can see her mind gathering speed.  Royce switches files quickly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Wickwire, Thomas Dane"... Second run at Coronado... and correct, they had him stashed in the "Appropriation Liaison Office," whatever that is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't crap out of Spec-Recon and get another shot without dispensation from someone up in flag country. (a revelation) He's got a Sea Daddy somewhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd sure like to know who.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.  Me too. INT.  ADMINISTRATION - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - DAY Answering a PHONE:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Administration, Ensign Blondell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't say my name.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's... (brightening) Lieuten -- JORDAN (V.O.) Or rank.  But can you do me a favor and pull a transfer order?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, but... You didn't have to do what you did.  Not for me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (appreciative) "Wickwire, Thomas Dane."  See what you can find.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Got it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who signed as his "sponsoring officer"?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh... don't see it.  There's no signature.  But hang on -- there's a note to "See Addendum."  Checking... She finds a crisp sheet of stationary, out of place among the smeared government forms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What'd you find, Kathy? CLOSE on the stationary.  It bears an image of the Capitol dome.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't even dream about leaving that vehicle there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Government car -- tow it if you want.  Just point us to DeHaven's office first. Not waiting for directions, Jordan takes the Capitol steps two at a time.  We've seen this look on her face before -- and last time, she nearly knocked the grinder bell into orbit. INT.  CORRIDOR - CAPITOL BLDG. - DAY Jordan and Royce move quickly down a corridor, eyes hunting, passing CAPITOL GUIDES and their tourists.  Soon they find... DeHaven's office.  A Navy captain exits with paperwork. Hasty salutes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Capt'n.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Commander. The captain moves on.  Royce holds in the doorway a beat, memory nagging him.  Again he looks at... The captain.  He has a distinct bald spot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Jordan) Get started here.  I'll catch up. Picking up where he left off a few weeks ago, Royce follows Bald Spot around a corner... INT.  PRIVATE STAIRCASE - CAPITOL BLDG. - DAY ... down a private staircase... INT.  ANOTHER CORRIDOR - CAPITOL BLDG. - DAY ... and through a door marked "Naval Appropriation Liaison Office."  It's not 30 seconds from DeHaven's door. INT.  FOYER - DEHAVEN'S OFFICE - CAPITOL BLDG. - DAY SECRETARY Your name again?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lieutenant j.g. O'Neil. In a side office, DeHaven's aide overhears.  He rises quickly and enters the foyer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ms. O'Neil.  Yes, of course.  I'm Douglas Champeau.  Unfortunately, the Senator is in chamber right now. How can I help you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What chamber?  Which way is that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, she's on the floor of the Senate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, which way?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She really can't be disturbed.  But if you care to wait, I'll find you an office with a phone.  It might be several hours, but -- A TOURIST pokes in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'Scuse me, but I'm here to pick up gallery tickets?  Are you...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See the secretary, please. Over the aide's shoulder, Jordan watches as... The tourist claims tickets.  HOLD on the bureau near the secretary's desk where the tickets are stored. INT.  SENATE CHAMBER - CAPITOL BLDG. - DAY On the chamber floor, SENATORS mull about, consulting aides, polling party mates.  PAGES place microphones and fill the ceremonial snuff boxes, readying the room for session.  Among the activity, we find... DeHaven.  Caucusing with another Democrat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Senator DeHaven... DeHaven looks behind her.  Nobody.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: DeHaven... Now she looks up to behold... Jordan standing in the gallery.  Staring down on DeHaven as she is, it's hard to read anything into her expression but open disdain. Drawn by Jordan's voice, a CAPITOL GUARD hurries down the gallery steps.  Royce runs interference.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can talk here or we can talk outside, Senator.  You tell me. On the floor, half the U.S. Senate stops what it's doing and looks up. In the gallery, the guard is thrown off-balance by the naval uniforms:  Do Royce and Jordan belong here or not? Confused, he looks for guidance from... DeHaven.  She notes C-SPAN cameras swinging Jordan's way. Summoning a page:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cloak room.  I'll meet her there. Just her. INT.  CLOAK ROOM - CAPITOL BLDG. - DAY Towering doors swing open.  DeHaven appears, face pleasant but harried.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jordan.  I always hoped we'd get together -- though just now I'm gearing up for a child-care vote that -- JORDAN Lieutenant Thomas Wickwire. About to hug Jordan, DeHaven stops awkwardly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sounds familiar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It should.  You nominated him for Spec-Recon just three days after you nominated me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jordan.  Might we do this over lunch tomorrow?  I do very much want to talk, but now is scarcely -- JORDAN Did you set me up?  Did you set me up just to see me fail?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Absolutely not. DeHaven glances back at the doors to the Senate chamber -- the open doors.  Walking Jordan a few steps away:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wickwire was there to help.  To be my eyes on the inside, to make sure you were getting a fair shot.  At least that was the intent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What changed?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Should probably ask him that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I have to ask again, Senator, I'll be asking in front of cameras. It's a threat DeHaven doesn't appreciate.  The Senate DOORKEEPER appears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Madam Senator?  Your esteemed colleagues are requesting -- DEHAVEN Two seconds, Walter. (answering Jordan) In 1981, the Supreme Court was asked to rule on the issue of women in combat positions.  The Court cited the 1948 Combat Exclusion Laws as a legal foundation for keeping women ineligible.  That decision held for all these years -- until the White House, 10 days ago, moved to have the Exclusion Laws voided. To demolish that legal foundation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So?  Isn't the President jumping on your bandwagon?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What he did was light the bandwagon on fire.  Because he knows what I know -- that American families are not prepared to put their daughters in harm's way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't know that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In face, I do:  Roper, Harris, Gallop -- they all come back the same.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you saying?  That a women's life is more valuable than a man's? That a women's death hurts a family more?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm saying it's not going to happen. Not when the President is set to turn this into a third-rail issue should I choose to ever campaign against him.  He will fry me six ways to Sunday for sending daughters and young mothers off to war -- and, quite possibly, for bringing them back in body bags. Jordan shakes her head in disbelief.  She has met the enemy -- and she is us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were never going to let women serve in combat.  You always had a safety net.  Or thought you did.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jordan.  I don't expect you to fully understand this -- but sometimes there's more to be gained from the fight than the victory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So the rhetoric gets you headlines. But the reality gets you in trouble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The reality is this:  We send far too many men off to war.  I don't need to compound the problem with women. (off Jordan's look) Can you honestly tell me you wanted that life?  Squat-pissing in some third-world jungle with -- JORDAN I wanted the choice.  The chance to prove myself, my skills, my work, me.  That's how it should've been.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Madam Senator, once again I must -- DEHAVEN Just hold the goddamn clock, Walter. Not happy about it, the doorkeeper reaches into an alcove, grabs a broom he keeps around for just these occasions. He enters the chamber... INT.  SENATE CHAMBER - CAPITOL BLDG. - DAY ... and moves behind the rostrum.  Holding the broom by the bristles, the doorkeeper stands on tip-toes... And uses the broom handle to turn back the Senate clock by three minutes. Senators GROAN.  It's an old trick played by senior members -- and they all hate it when it happens to them. INT.  CLOAK ROOM - CAPITOL BLDG. - DAY DEHAVEN I once promised you a fast ticket, Jordan, and I always meant to make good on that.  Come work for me.  I can always use a hard-charger on my team.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You promise Wickwire a fast ticket, too?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've had no direct communication with him since this whole thing began.  And that's quite verifiable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sure it is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll think about my offer?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, I wonder what the SecNav would think about it.  If I spoke with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I spoke with Mr. Hayes this morning myself -- and told him the deal was off.  No more test cases. He was only too happy to oblige. (dangerously low) Don't play politics with me, little darlin'.  You'd be up way past your bedtime.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (distraught) Madam Senator, please...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll call you in a few days. She flashes a winning smile and turns away.  As the chamber doors start to close behind her:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So I wonder what the President would think. The last image we have of DeHaven is her whirling back, startled.  The DOORS BOOM CLOSED in her face. EXT.  C.O.'S HOUSE - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - NIGHT Through a window, we see the C.O. with a phone pressed to his ear.  He stands at attention even though wearing a bathrobe.  Half-audible through the glass: C.O. Yes sir.  No, I'm not saying it would be impossible, sir, just... Yes sir.  No sir.  Yes sir.  I can appreciate that, sir.  Good night, sir. INT.  C.O.'S HOUSE - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - NIGHT The C.O. hangs up and looks to Jordan, heretofore unseen. She waits anxiously. C.O. Well, if you had to go over my head, lieutenant, that's the way to do it.  Christ, nothin' like a 0-200 call from the Commander and Chief to get the bowels movin'.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir?  What did he say? C.O. Basically -- he asked me if I could unring a bell. EXT.  GRINDER - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - DAY START on the helmet graveyard.  Hands enter FRAME to reclaim one helmet in particular.  TILT UP on Jordan, back in the grinder, back in Navy greens. The Spec-Recon class is here.  Crewmates gawk like stone idiots as Jordan takes her old place in the line-up. C.O. (to class) One of you here understands better than anyone what this is all about. Someone who has engaged in conduct unbecoming.  Someone who knows, I would hope, what he must now do. CLOSE on Wickwire.  Feeling the heat.  Wondering if they really know who it is.  Now the C.O. parks himself right in Wickwire's face. C.O. And unless that someone takes the honorable way out in the next 10 seconds -- I will make certain he faces action under the Uniform Code of Military Justice. Wickwire breaks rank and heads for the bell.  He slows when reaching Jordan, considering an apology he knows would be inadequate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just walk away and never stop. He does.  As Wickwire RINGS OUT: C.O. It seems we have an opening for class officer.  Any nominations? Eyes swing to Jordan.  Way ahead of them: C.O. All those in favor? A CHORUS OF AYES.  Jordan puddles up. C.O. Chief Urgayle, turning it back over to you. On his way to the front, the Chief stops to check in with Jordan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I'm trying to figure out if you're stupid, unlucky, gluttonous
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: . FADE IN: EXT.  UPRIVER - THE POTOMAC - DAY The ice floes are gone.  The river banks are budding green.  Soon CAMERA FINDS a power boat making its way upriver.  A lone figure sits on the prow. EXT.  POWER BOAT - DAY It's Jordan.  Dressed in civvies, gunnysack between her legs, she's back in Virginia with nothing more than what she left with.  Around a river bend appears... The gunkhole harbor.  Home. EXT.  GUNKHOLE HARBOR - POTOMAC - DAY The boat docks.  Jordan springs clear, waves a worn-out thanks, starts up the dock.  But now she comes to a stop, seeing... Royce.  Stepping out of the house. EXTREMELY WIDE:  River shimmering behind them, they meet on the dock.  A charged stand-off:  Where do they pick up? Can they pick up?  Then Jordan drops her gunnysack and steps into his wide-spread arms.  Royce wraps her up as if to never let go. For the first time in this whole ordeal, Jordan begins crying, sobbing uncontrollably.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT.  ADMINISTRATION - CORONADO NAVAL BASE - DAY File in hand, Blondell returns to the phone.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : EXT.  CAPITOL BLDG. - WASHINGTON D.C. - DAY The real Capitol dome.  A flag is being raised over the Senate Wing. EXT.  CAPITOL BDLG.  - WASHINGTON D.C. - DAY A car parks at barricades.  Jordan and Royce emerge, both in uniforms. D.C. COP
dialogue.name: dialogue
